resources.string: The National Air and Space Museum of the Smithsonian Institution, also called the NASM, is a museum in Washington, D.C.. It holds the largest collection of historic aircraft and spacecraft in the world.
The Newseum is an interactive museum that promotes free expression and the First Amendment to the United States Constitution, while tracing the evolution of communication.
Sophisticated restaurant and lounge serving modern Indian food, including the popular crispy spinach.

The Eighteenth Street Lounge is dedicated to providing Washington D.C. with acclaimed DJ talent from the region and as well hosting special guest DJs from all over the world. We also showcase live bands specializing in Reggae, Bossa Nova, Classic Jazz, and Funk - Tuesday through Saturday.
